core

Class RessourceCache

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.RessourceCache
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IRessourceCache, java.io.Serializable

    public class RessourceCache
extends java.lang.Object
implements IRessourceCache, java.io.Serializable
    scanning the filesystem for map files and savegames create and hold filedependend configuration objects
    Version:
    0.5.6
    Author:
    Jasper, Felix, Fabian, Raphael
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
